main.name: David Halliday
main.description: Conveniently connecting you to your next vehicle
main.bio: My name is David Halliday, I started in the automotive industry in early 2020 as a sales consultant. We look to provide a simplified vehicle search service with this website, allowing the customer to tailor the options best suited for their lifestyle. With the information provided, we will respond with vehicle options either directly with myself, or connecting you with other industry professionals to find exactly what you are looking for.
